```{r counties_death}
counties_topTen_death <- counties %>%
  filter(date == "2020-04-08") %>%
  arrange(-deaths) %>%
  slice(1:10)

counties_death %>%
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = reorder(county, deaths), y = deaths)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") + 
  theme_minimal() + 
  labs(title = "Coronavirus in specific counties", 
       y = "Deaths", x = "County Name")

```
